button.label: Auto Wall Generator
button.title: Automatically generate walls from scene image

notifications.error: Error creating walls. Check the console for details.

sensitivity.name: Edge Detection Sensitivity
sensitivity.hint: Adjust the sensitivity of edge detection (higher values detect more edges)

wallType.name: Default Wall Type
wallType.hint: The type of wall to create

darkSceneEnhancement.name: Dark Scene Enhancement
darkSceneEnhancement.hint: Automatically enhance dark scenes for better wall detection

textureFiltering.name: Texture Filtering
textureFiltering.hint: Filter out walls that appear to be textures or patterns

wallContinuity.name: Wall Continuity
wallContinuity.hint: How strongly to prefer continuous walls over disconnected segments

minEdgeStrength.name: Minimum Edge Strength
minEdgeStrength.hint: Minimum strength required to consider a pixel as an edge (reduces noise)

maxEdgeStrength.name: Maximum Edge Strength
maxEdgeStrength.hint: Maximum strength threshold for strong edges

enhancementMethod.name: Dark Region Enhancement Method
enhancementMethod.hint: Choose the method for enhancing dark regions
